hera.api.model

Interface Account

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAccount, AccountWithAddress, AccountWithAddressAndSigner, AccountWithKey

    @ApiAudience.Public
 @ApiStability.Unstable
public interface Account

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bindState(AccountState state)
      Bind state to an account.
      AccountAddress getAddress()
      Get address of an account.

    • Method Detail

      • getAddress

        AccountAddress getAddress()
        Get address of an account.
        Returns:
        address

      • bindState

        void bindState(AccountState state)
        Bind state to an account. If nonce is less or equals to 0, nonce is set as 1. Remember, AccountState.address is not binded. Only nonce is binded.
        Parameters:
        state - state to bind

      • setNonce

        void setNonce(long nonce)
        Set nonce for account. If a passed nonce is less than 0, set as 0.
        Parameters:
        nonce - nonce to set

      • getRecentlyUsedNonce

        long getRecentlyUsedNonce()
        Get nonce for account.
        Returns:
        an nonce

      • getNonce

        @Deprecated
long getNonce()
        Deprecated. Use getRecentlyUsedNonce() instead.
        Get nonce for account.
        Returns:
        an nonce

      • incrementAndGetNonce

        long incrementAndGetNonce()
        Increment an nonce and get it.
        Returns:
        an nonce

      • getKey

        AergoKey getKey()
        Get AergoKey if holds. Otherwise return null.
        Returns:
        AergoKey if holds. Otherwise null.
